title: Exploring the antitumor potential of novel quinoline derivatives via tubulin polymerization inhibition in breast cancer; design, synthesis and molecular docking
content:

A series of quinoline derivatives was designed and synthesized as novel tubulin inhibitors targeting the colchicine binding site.
